name: tailwind-palette-generator
title: Tailwind Palette Generator
description: Generates a color palette out of a given color HEX
author: dima_shatrov

commands.name: create-palette
commands.title: Create Palette
commands.subtitle: Generate a tailwindcss color palette based on given color
commands.description: Generates a tailwindcss color palette based on given color

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
